events.name: Uncle George's Christmas Party
events.details: Meet Santa and the Fairy, Noddy and his friends, all at the fairy's magical castle.

events.name: Boerevintage Market
events.details: Boere vintage Gift Market will once again have a gift pop-up market at the fantastic Redberry Farm in Geelhoutboom, George.

events.name: Carols by Candlelight
events.details: Enjoy an evening in songs and receive a memorable Christmas message at Redberry Farm. The guest artist that will be perfoming is Michael Lindt.
